candidates.title: chore(release): bump to v0.1.0, update README & CHANGELOG
candidates.body:
Summary Bump version to v0.1.0, update docs and changelog, and add release draft.

This PR prepares ai-lib for v0.1.0 by:

Bumping [Cargo.toml](vscode-file://vscode-app/c:/Users/walex/AppData/Local/Programs/Microsoft%20VS%20Code/resources/app/out/vs/code/electron-browser/workbench/workbench.html) to 0.1.0.
Updating [README.md](vscode-file://vscode-app/c:/Users/walex/AppData/Local/Programs/Microsoft%20VS%20Code/resources/app/out/vs/code/electron-browser/workbench/workbench.html) and [README_CN.md](vscode-file://vscode-app/c:/Users/walex/AppData/Local/Programs/Microsoft%20VS%20Code/resources/app/out/vs/code/electron-browser/workbench/workbench.html) to document new features and usage patterns (DynHttpTransport, with_transport_ref, Cohere/Mistral adapters, Bedrock note).
Adding [CHANGELOG.md](vscode-file://vscode-app/c:/Users/walex/AppData/Local/Programs/Microsoft%20VS%20Code/resources/app/out/vs/code/electron-browser/workbench/workbench.html) entry for v0.1.0 and [RELEASE_0.1.0_DRAFT.md](vscode-file://vscode-app/c:/Users/walex/AppData/Local/Programs/Microsoft%20VS%20Code/resources/app/out/vs/code/electron-browser/workbench/workbench.html) (release notes/QA checklist).
Adding/adjusting adapter files and transport object-safe shim to support testing and streaming.
Adding examples to exercise model listing and Cohere streaming.
Files changed (high level):

[Cargo.toml](vscode-file://vscode-app/c:/Users/walex/AppData/Local/Programs/Microsoft%20VS%20Code/resources/app/out/vs/code/electron-browser/workbench/workbench.html) (version bump)
[README.md](vscode-file://vscode-app/c:/Users/walex/AppData/Local/Programs/Microsoft%20VS%20Code/resources/app/out/vs/code/electron-browser/workbench/workbench.html), [README_CN.md](vscode-file://vscode-app/c:/Users/walex/AppData/Local/Programs/Microsoft%20VS%20Code/resources/app/out/vs/code/electron-browser/workbench/workbench.html) (docs updated)
[CHANGELOG.md](vscode-file://vscode-app/c:/Users/walex/AppData/Local/Programs/Microsoft%20VS%20Code/resources/app/out/vs/code/electron-browser/workbench/workbench.html) (Unreleased / 0.1.0 section added)
[RELEASE_0.1.0_DRAFT.md](vscode-file://vscode-app/c:/Users/walex/AppData/Local/Programs/Microsoft%20VS%20Code/resources/app/out/vs/code/electron-browser/workbench/workbench.html) (new)
Provider and transport changes (mistral, cohere, dyn transport, generic adapter migrations)
Examples added: [list_models_smoke.rs](vscode-file://vscode-app/c:/Users/walex/AppData/Local/Programs/Microsoft%20VS%20Code/resources/app/out/vs/code/electron-browser/workbench/workbench.html), [cohere_stream.rs](vscode-file://vscode-app/c:/Users/walex/AppData/Local/Programs/Microsoft%20VS%20Code/resources/app/out/vs/code/electron-browser/workbench/workbench.html)
Notes for reviewers

The README examples use use ai_lib::.... This is correct Rust crate path usage: Cargo package name may contain hyphens ("ai-lib") but crate imports use underscores (ai_lib).
AWS Bedrock integration is intentionally deferred and removed from public exports to keep the API stable for 0.1.0. See CHANGELOG and README for migration notes.
Key change: object-safe transport trait DynHttpTransport and boxed shim. Review transport API and adapter constructors ([with_transport_ref](vscode-file://vscode-app/c:/Users/walex/AppData/Local/Programs/Microsoft%20VS%20Code/resources/app/out/vs/code/electron-browser/workbench/workbench.html)) for testability and ergonomics.
QA checklist

 cargo check --all-targets passes
 cargo test (where applicable)
 Run cargo run --example list_models_smoke with provider API keys configured
 Verify README examples compile (optional quick smoke)
Labels / reviewers (suggested)

Labels: release, docs, chore
Reviewers: @hiddenpath
